item.title: PSA: Epic Games Forums Hacked
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hunter)
item.dc:creator: Hunter
item.content:encoded:
On July 14th Epic Games forums were hacked resulting in a hacker gaining access to all the information stored in the database.

The data the hacker gained access to includes: your email, date of birth and password which we know was only an MD5 of an MD5+SALT of your password which means there is a chance your password has been decrypted.

If you use the same password in other locations, especially your email account it is suggested you change your password as quickly as possible.

Like me...

PSA: Epic Games Forums Hacked

item.title: 17 Years of Unreal Tournament
item.author: invalid@example.com (Sir_Brizz)
item.dc:creator: Sir_Brizz
item.content:encoded:
Today it is hard not to think of how the time has flown. 17 years ago, Unreal Tournament was unleashed on the world beginning a new age of multiplayer gaming. It's not that multiplayer games didn't exist before 1999. They absolutely did. But in 1999, games went from including multiplayer as an afterthought because it was complicated to configure and use to being a primary focus and the selling point of many games. Sure, Unreal and Half Life had fairly simple to use multiplayer. But neither...

17 Years of Unreal Tournament

item.title: Epic unveils Paragon...kinda
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hunter)
item.dc:creator: Hunter
item.content:encoded:
The latest game from Epic games has been announced, but that is about it.

Paragon at this point in time could be just about anything, and in the coming weeks Epic will be revealing more information.

Currently all we know is there are possibly 5 playable characters, Twinblast, Steel, Sparrow, Dekker and Grux and that is it. The site contains little information currently so we are all wondering what could possibly be happening.

item.title: CliffyB Unveiling New Game This Week
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hunter)
item.dc:creator: Hunter
item.content:encoded:
To some he will always be CliffyB, to others all they know is he was the creator of Gears of War. Now, he's back with his latest title for PC.



I *told* you to #BraceYourself ... Register now: http://t.co/wOxsFsXplO Trust me, folks - buckle up. I am so excited right now.

-- Cliff Bleszinski (@therealcliffyb) August 23, 2015

With...

CliffyB Unveiling New Game This Week

item.title: Paragon Gameplay Trailer
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hunter)
item.dc:creator: Hunter
item.content:encoded: Epic Games have lifted the lid of Paragon, a MOBA coming to PC and PS4 in 2016.

item.title: Rocket League is a UE3 Carball... MUST PLAY!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Sir_Brizz)
item.dc:creator: Sir_Brizz
item.content:encoded:
If you haven't heard by now somehow, there is this game called Rocket League. It is a thing and you should buy and/or play it.

Now that I clearly have your undivided attention, let's get real. Rocket League is the sequel to Super Acrobatic something something cars that nobody remembers or played. The difference this time is that lots of people play it and it is good. The fact that as I write this the game has over 13k players playing on Steam and peaked at almost 20k today should tell you...

Rocket League is a UE3 Carball... MUST PLAY!

item.title: BeyondUnreal is dead! Long live BeyondUnreal!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Sir_Brizz)
item.dc:creator: Sir_Brizz
item.content:encoded:
All good things come to an end, except BeyondUnreal. Yeah, the site is in disrepair and the updates are extremely slow, but don't let that clickbait title fool you, we are here for the long haul. Unfortunately, our host for the past 4 years, AtomicGamer, is shutting down at the end of this month.

Some of you probably know that I recently took just the forums independent again. I believe we get enough traffic to keep the site running on paltry ad revenues with a little stipend out of my...

BeyondUnreal is dead! Long live BeyondUnreal!

item.title: Gearbox owns Duke Nukem
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hunter)
item.dc:creator: Hunter
item.content:encoded:
Gearbox vs 3D Realms & Interceptor Entertainment has been an ongoing battle since Feb '14 since 3D Realms gave Interceptor a license to develop a Duke Nukem titled game. However a joint statement has now been made by all parties involved after a settlement had been agreed on in May.

I'm really happy that the lawsuit between Gearbox, 3DR, and Interceptor has come to an end. Right now, I, along with my Interceptor colleagues,...
Click to expand...
Gearbox owns Duke Nukem

item.title: Gears of War: Ultimate Edition coming to PC
item.author: invalid@example.com (Hunter)
item.dc:creator: Hunter
item.content:encoded:
PC Gamers haven't had much love from Microsoft in recent years and that's because Gears of War was such a massive hit on the Xbox.

Now Microsoft is looking to right those wrongs and has announced that that Gears of War: Ultimate Edition is coming to PCs running Windows 10.



Just announced at the @PCGamer E3 Briefing... Gears of War: Ultimate Edition will be coming to Windows 10! #GearsPC...

Gears of War: Ultimate Edition coming to PC

item.title: Can I Has UT Files?!
item.author: invalid@example.com (DeathBooger)
item.dc:creator: DeathBooger
item.content:encoded:
Yes, yes you can.

Out of my own loving, cuddly heart, I have uploaded all of Beyond Unreal's UT file library to my Dropbox account and have made it public. You no longer have to go to other sites and wait in line for a server to download something.

What you see is what we got. I won't be taking submissions to add things on a regular basis. This is my private Dropbox account and I need it for other things as well so space is limited.

If you see empty folders it is because some of the...

Can I Has UT Files?!

item.title: Killing Floor 2 beta gameplay: Biotics Lab
item.author: invalid@example.com (JohnDoe641)
item.dc:creator: JohnDoe641
item.content:encoded:
My second match in the beta for Killing Floor 2 sees the return of the Biotics Lab but it's in name only. The layout is completely different but it's a great homage to a classic KF map.


​

item.title: Killing Floor 2 beta gameplay: Burning Paris
item.author: invalid@example.com (JohnDoe641)
item.dc:creator: JohnDoe641
item.content:encoded:
If you're a fan of the retail version of Killing Floor, you'll appreciate a lot of the improvements in Killing Floor 2 so far. The first thing you notice is the graphics, thanks to a heavily modified version of Unreal Engine 3, you have some of the highest levels of detail possible and it runs butter smooth on the highest quality settings if you have a decent video card. The game-play has been tweaked in many aspects which didn't seem apparent to me when I was playing, but after watching the...

Killing Floor 2 beta gameplay: Burning Paris

item.title: Killing Floor 2 Beta Impressions
item.author: invalid@example.com (hal)
item.dc:creator: hal
item.content:encoded:
I've been playing the Killing Floor 2 beta for a few days now. It's a pretty limited version of the full game so it's hard to come away with a defining opinion, but so far I can safely say that it's more Killing Floor. If you liked the first game you will like this game. If you didn't, then you should hold off until the game is further along before forming an opinion. It will be released into Early Access on Steam, April 21st....

Killing Floor 2 Beta Impressions

item.title: Killing Floor 2 - Gameplay, Boss Footage
item.author: invalid@example.com (hal)
item.dc:creator: hal
item.content:encoded:
Killing Floor 2 is set to release into Steam Early Access on April 21, 2015. As part of the buildup to release, Tripwire has been busy showing off their latest game to the media.

What they've not shown, however, is one of the reportedly several new boss characters. In this video, hosted by Total Biscuit, you get nearly an hour of gameplay over several levels, one of which ends in a fight with an exoskeleton-wearing antagonist. Looking good!



​

item.title: April Fools Nostalgia!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Sir_Brizz)
item.dc:creator: Sir_Brizz
item.content:encoded:
We didn't come up with a mind bending April Fools joke this year, but I thought it would be fun to reminisce about some of the old April Fools jokes over the years at BU.

  • On April 1, 2002, the forums were re-branded the "m0rums" and targeted exclusively at "m0tards"
  • On April 1, 2003, BeyondUnreal was taken over by the FBI and shut down
  • On April 1, 2004, BeyondUnreal announced...

April Fools Nostalgia!

item.title: BeyondUnreal Podcast #25: Five Controversial Issues
item.author: invalid@example.com (Sir_Brizz)
item.dc:creator: Sir_Brizz
item.content:encoded:
We are back from a long break and here is the first BeyondUnreal Podcast of the new year (yes, we are on #25 and I have been really lazy about posting news on these podcasts but we do keep doing them! Subscribe to us on Youtube to keep up with the releases).

This week we talk about a few of the more controversial issues in the game right now. Enjoy!

​

item.title: Killing Floor 2 - More Gore 2 Dev Diary
item.author: invalid@example.com (hal)
item.dc:creator: hal
item.content:encoded:
What's better than gore? More gore! In this IGN Dev Diary, Tripwire Interactive shows off more of Killing Floor 2. Much of the footage is similar to what they've shown in the past, but it looks so good and meaty that I can't help but just smile when I see it.

Check it out:



​

item.title: UT4 Pre-Alpha Build Updated
item.author: invalid@example.com (Sir_Brizz)
item.dc:creator: Sir_Brizz
item.content:encoded:
Many of our readers surely know that you can get and play UT4 right now through Epic's UT forums. All you have to do is register on the forums here and visit this link to get started. (Click 'YES' then my recommendation is to get the Epic Launcher as it keeps the game up to date and has much smaller modular updates each week)....

UT4 Pre-Alpha Build Updated

item.title: Killing Floor 2 Dev Diary -- Shut Up And Take My Dosh!
item.author: invalid@example.com (hal)
item.dc:creator: hal
item.content:encoded:
IGN has posted Killing Floor 2 Dev Diary 2 that features gameplay footage and lots of blood. And lots of talking about lots of blood. The carnage looks so meaty and satisfying that I'm either feeling hunger pangs or I just can't wait to get my hands on the game.



​

item.title: Hammerlock and Torgue on BL2 Pre-Sequel
item.author: invalid@example.com (hal)
item.dc:creator: hal
item.content:encoded:
This is probably the video that they should have shown us first. I've been pretty cautiously optimistic on the Borderlands 2 Pre-Sequel thus far because the best stuff has been coming from Gearbox. Some of the weaker DLC from previous games had been farmed out, partly, to various studios and, frankly, it showed.

Hammerlock and Torgue team up to walk you through all of the new stuff in the Pre-Sequel. The gameplay mechanics do look quite different than in the previous game and could make...

Hammerlock and Torgue on BL2 Pre-Sequel
